headline: Republic Services (RSG): Valuation Insights Following Updated 2025 Revenue Guidance and Mixed Quarterly Results
summary: Republic Services (RSG) reported its third-quarter earnings, showing a rise in revenue but a slight dip in net income compared to last year. The company also adjusted its full-year outlook, with 2025 revenue now expected to be near the low end of guidance. See our latest analysis for Republic Services. Republic Services’ third quarter results and lowered full-year revenue outlook seem to have softened sentiment, with the share price sliding 9.3% over the past month. Even so, long-term...

headline: Can Republic Services’ (RSG) Share Buybacks Offset Lowered Revenue Guidance?
summary: Republic Services reported third quarter 2025 earnings with sales of US$4.2 billion and net income of US$550 million, while announcing that revenue for the year is expected to be near the low end of previous guidance. Despite slightly lower quarterly earnings and revised guidance, the company demonstrated financial resilience through significant share repurchases and ongoing free cash flow strength. We'll now explore how Republic Services' updated earnings guidance and strong buyback...
